findings.title: Old Solidity Version
findings.description: Using an old version of Solidity prevents access to new security checks and it is recommended to avoid complex pragma statements.

findings.title: Missing docstrings
findings.description: It is extremely difficult to locate any contracts or functions, as they lack documentation. One consequence of this is that reviewers' understanding of the code's intention is impeded, which is significant because it is necessary to accurately determine both security and correctness.

findings.title: Typos
findings.description: Please consider fixing the following typos: Destoys should be Destroys and stardard should be standard.
